docs.title: Welcome to Ram's Home Page
docs.text:
I am a Web developer at Centre for Visual Information Technology (CVIT), IIIT Hyderabad I am working under Professor Prof. C V Jawahar and IHub Data Foundation (IIITH IHub Data Foundation).

My primary area of interest is in DevOps Engineer , Website Development to design the creative website. Specifically, I am interested in Full Stack Developer.

Before IIIT-H, I join the ICICI Academy for Skills, Hyderabad. I led the recommendation and suggestion team for the Web Designing on HTML, CSS and Javascript to develop Static Website.

In 2020, I travelled to Uttar Pradesh to collect the 300+ hrs of data for the EGO 4D project with Collaboration of Facebook AI. In the mean, I was coordinating with my team members in Kerala, Bengal, Gujarat, Telangana, and Andra Pradesh to complete the 1000 hrs of data capture for EGO4D Project.

In 2021, I travelled to Goa, Yadagirigutta, Vikarabad, Warangal and whole Telangana for the Data collection with Mobility Bodhyaan Platform for iRaste-Telangana Project.

In my free time, I like to read new python library reletaed to Data Science and Machine Learning.

docs.title: FEB 28, 2017
docs.text: • Completed my Web Designing Course at ICICI Academy for Skills.

docs.title: CV
docs.text:
A DevOps Engineer with strong expertise in designing, implementing, and optimising continuous integration, continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure deployment. Strong communicator and problem solver who fosters a culture of continuous improvement..
